name: Always prefer joining tables to subqueries (PeopleSoft)
description: This quality rule reports all PeopleSoft SQL Definitions having subqueries.
output:
This report lists all PeopleSoft SQL Definitions having subqueries. It provides the following information:
- PeopleSoft SQL Definitions full name.
rationale:
Having complex queries can cause performance problems. Queries with Subqueries is considered complex.
Query with Subqueries are often costlier than the query using Joins.
reference:
Best Practices - Querying - Avoiding Sub Queries : http://strictlysql.blogspot.com/2008/12/best-practices-querying-avoiding-sub.html
Converting Subqueries to Joins: https://learnsql.com/blog/converting-subqueries-joins/
remediation:
You can use an Explain Plan to get an objective answer.
If appropriate, replace the subquery by a JOIN.
alternativeName: Always prefer joining tables to subqueries (PeopleSoft)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
